tests.test_input:
(  ns
 foo.bar.baz  "some doc"
    (:require (foo.bar [abc :as abc]
        def))
    (:use foo.bar.qux)
    (:import foo.bar.qux.Foo
      ;; Need this for the thing
      foo.bar.qux.Bar)
    )

(defn hello "says hi" (
      [] (hello "world")
  ) ([name]
  ( println "Hello," name  )
  ))
tests.test_output:
(ns foo.bar.baz
  "some doc"
  (:require
    [foo.bar.abc :as abc]
    [foo.bar.def]
    [foo.bar.qux :refer :all])
  (:import
    (foo.bar.qux
      ;; Need this for the thing
      Bar
      Foo)))


(defn hello
  "says hi"
  ([] (hello "world"))
  ([name]
   (println "Hello," name)))

description: A tool for formatting Clojure code
